frontmatter.title: Consumer Online Privacy Rights Act (COPRA)
frontmatter.subtitle: Codifies privacy as a right and creates a private right of action to enforce privacy rights and oversight of platforms
frontmatter.by: U.S. Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation Ranking Member Maria Cantwell (D-WA) and fellow senior members Senators Brian Schatz (D-HI), Amy Klobuchar (D-MN), and Ed Markey (D-MA)
